Package org.elasticsearch.index.recovery

Class RecoveryStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.recovery.RecoveryStats
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable, ToXContent, ToXContentFragment

    public class RecoveryStats
extends java.lang.Object
implements ToXContentFragment, Streamable
    Recovery related statistics, starting at the shard level and allowing aggregation to indices and node level
